response.overview: In the early summer of 2025, I traveled to Croatia for the 33rd Croatian One-Minute Film Festival to present a short film. So I took a camera with me to shoot shots of Velika Gorica, Po≈æega and Zagreb.  With the material obtained I put together this film-postcard for Alita, very inspired by Teo Hernandez and Tomonari Nishikawa.
response.title: Postal de Croacia para Alita
